query.name: findEventCRFAuditEventsWithItemDataType
query.sql: SELECT ale.audit_id, ale.audit_date, ale.audit_table, ale.user_id, ale.entity_id, ale.entity_name, ale.reason_for_change, ale.audit_log_event_type_id, ale.old_value, ale.new_value, ale.event_crf_id, ale.user_name, ale.name, item.item_data_type_id ,ale.study_event_id FROM (SELECT ale.audit_id, ale.audit_date, ale.audit_table, ale.user_id, ale.entity_id, ale.entity_name, ale.reason_for_change, ale.audit_log_event_type_id, ale.old_value, ale.new_value, ale.event_crf_id, ua.user_name, alet.name ,ale.study_event_id FROM audit_log_event ale JOIN user_account ua ON ale.user_id=ua.user_id JOIN audit_log_event_type alet ON ale.audit_log_event_type_id=alet.audit_log_event_type_id WHERE ale.audit_log_event_type_id IN (1,8,9,10,11,12,13,14,15,16,30,32,33,40,41) AND ale.event_crf_id=? )as ale LEFT JOIN item_data id ON ale.audit_log_event_type_id IN (1,12,13,30) and ale.entity_id = id.item_data_id LEFT JOIN item ON id.item_id = item.item_id and ale.entity_name = item.name

query.name: findAllEventCRFAuditEvents
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT on (joe.event_crf_version_id) ale.audit_id, ale.audit_date, ale.audit_table, ale.user_id, ale.entity_id, ale.entity_name, ale.reason_for_change, ale.audit_log_event_type_id, ale.old_value, ale.new_value, ale.event_crf_id, ua.user_name, alet.name, item.item_data_type_id , joe.event_crf_version_id,cv.name crf_version_name,c.name crf_name, joe.study_event_id , id.ordinal,ec.date_interviewed , ec.interviewer_name , ale.item_data_repeat_key FROM audit_log_event ale JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT event_crf_id, study_event_id, event_crf_version_id from audit_log_event ale where ale.event_crf_id in (SELECT DISTINCT ale.event_crf_id from audit_log_event ale WHERE ale.audit_log_event_type_id IN (1,12,13,30) AND ale.study_event_id=?) AND event_crf_version_id is not Null order by event_crf_version_id) joe ON joe.event_crf_id = ale.event_crf_id JOIN user_account ua ON ale.user_id=ua.user_id JOIN audit_log_event_type alet ON ale.audit_log_event_type_id=alet.audit_log_event_type_id LEFT JOIN item_data id ON ale.audit_log_event_type_id IN (1,12,13,30) and ale.entity_id = id.item_data_id LEFT JOIN item ON id.item_id = item.item_id and ale.entity_name =item.name LEFT JOIN event_crf ec ON ec.event_crf_id=joe.event_crf_id LEFT JOIN crf_version cv ON cv. crf_version_id= joe.event_crf_version_id LEFT JOIN crf c On c.crf_id = cv.crf_id where (old_value !='' or new_value !='') order by joe.event_crf_version_id,item_data_type_id

query.name: findAllEventCRFAuditEventsWithItemDataType

AND event_crf_version_id is not Null order by event_crf_version_id) joe ON joe.event_crf_id = ale.event_crf_id JOIN user_account ua ON ale.user_id=ua.user_id JOIN audit_log_event_type alet ON ale.audit_log_event_type_id=alet.audit_log_event_type_id LEFT JOIN item_data id ON ale.audit_log_event_type_id IN (1,12,13,30) and ale.entity_id = id.item_data_id LEFT JOIN item ON id.item_id = item.item_id and ale.entity_name =item.name LEFT JOIN event_crf ec ON ec.event_crf_id=joe.event_crf_id LEFT JOIN crf_version cv ON cv. crf_version_id= joe.event_crf_version_id LEFT JOIN crf c On c.crf_id = cv.crf_id where (old_value !='' or new_value !='') order by ale.audit_date, joe.event_crf_version_id, event_crf_id
